title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 705.11 - Reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 705.11 - Reimbursement

State Regulations

The pertinent provisions of Part 86 of this Title shall
apply to approved medical technology demonstration projects; provided, however, that reimbursement pursuant to title 11 (Medical Assistance for Needy Persons)
of article 5 of the Social Services Law shall not be available unless there is

Federal financial participation pursuant to title XIX of the Social Security

Act (Medicaid). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
705.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
